word: H3789 - כָּתַב - kâthab - kaw-thab' - Describe - விவரி

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - எழுதியிரு. எழுதிக்கொடு, மறுமொழியாகச்சொல், விசாரி, எழுதப்படு, வாசி, எழுது, கையெழுத்துப்போடு
to write, to record, to enrol
1) to write, to inscribe, to engrave, to write in, to write on
2) to write down, to describe in writing
3) to register, to enroll, to record
2) to be written down, to be recorded, to be enrolled
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to grave; by implication to write (describe, inscribe, prescribe, subscribe): - describe, record, prescribe, subscribe, write (-ing, -ten).
Cognate: H3789, H3791, H3793, H3794, H4385
